meanings.definition: Two corresponding things designed for use together.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of shoes for the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pair of earrings that matched her necklace.
meanings.sent3: The pair of gloves danced together in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The pair of keys unlocked the mystery of the old chest.
meanings.sent5: The pair of socks hugged my feet snugly.

meanings.definition: A set of two similar or matching items.
meanings.sent1: The store had a lovely pair of vases on sale.
meanings.sent2: He gifted her a pair of candles for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The pair of chairs looked like twins in the room.
meanings.sent4: The pair of paintings hung side by side on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The pair of books sat neatly on the shelf.

meanings.definition: A couple or set of two people or animals.
meanings.sent1: The pair of friends went on a hike together.
meanings.sent2: The pair of puppies played joyfully in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The pair of birds chirped a duet in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The pair of siblings shared a special bond.
meanings.sent5: The pair of dancers moved in perfect harmony.
